document.full_text: new york city has sliced its way to fiscal health under mayor michael bloomberg, but the political independent could be forced to raise taxes if the public rejects more service cuts, a fiscal watchdog group's report said on tuesday.
document.title: nyc residents may prefer taxes to cuts: watchdog
lines_and_colors: new york city has sliced its way to fiscal health under mayor michael bloomberg, but the political independent could be forced to raise taxes if the public rejects more service cuts, a fiscal watchdog group's report said on tuesday.
